com.camerontec.util.logsreplication.client

Class LoggerReplicationStateMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponentWithName
      • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponentWithLogger
        • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponentWithLifeCycle
          • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponent
            • com.camerontec.util.logsreplication.client.LoggerReplicationStateMachine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoggerEventListener, IHasLifeCycle, IHasName, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanNameAware

    public class LoggerReplicationStateMachine
extends BaseComponent
implements LoggerEventListener
    The replication server state machine.

    This state machine handles the client side replication state. Waiting for an attribute change notification signifying data is present, then sending the data push request and then waiting for the connection to be made.
